messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] email address help!
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 6/6/02 4:19:49 PM, bipittwice@aol.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 6/6/02 4:19:49 PM, bipittwice@... writes:

<< I've changed my email address, and have been trying to change it on
my email preferences for this group. >>

Subscribe under the new address and delete the old one (or just unsubscribe
the old one). If that doesn't work, let me know what the new and old ones
are and what settings you want and I'll change it.

Sandra

messages.subject: email address help!
messages.msgSnippet: Hi, I ve changed my email address, and have been trying to change it on my email preferences for this group.  For some reason it isn t working.  As a result,
messages.messageBody:
Hi,

I've changed my email address, and have been trying to change it on
my email preferences for this group. For some reason it isn't
working. As a result, I'm not able to get the emails from the group
and I'm bouncing mail as well. Anyone have any suggestions, or any
idea what's wrong with yahoogroups? I tried creating a new yahoo ID,
thinking that would be simpler than trying to change my email
preferences, and I got an error message over and over again. I've
tried emailing yahoo, but haven't gotten a response. Can anyone give
me a clue? Thanks!
pax.
Athena
